
# Peg solitaire solver

## Board
Positions are represented using bitboards. For example 1010794128125489208 is 111000000111000011111110011101110011111110000111000000111000 in binary or when split into chunks of 9:
```
000111000
000111000
011111110
011101110
011111110
000111000
000111000
```
Bit indices are:
```
62 61 60|59 58 57|56 55 54 
53 52 51|50 49 48|47 46 45 
44|43 42 41 40 39 38 37|36 
35|34 33 32 31 30 29 28|27 
26|25 24 23 22 21 20 19|18 
17 16 15|14 13 12|11 10 09 
08 07 06|05 04 03|02 01 00
```

## Solution

```
   111   
   111   
 1111111 
 1110111 
 1111111 
   111   
   111   

   111   
   101   
 1110111 
 1111111 
 1111111 
   111   
   111   

   111   
   101   
 1001111 
 1111111 
 1111111 
   111   
   111   

   011   
   001   
 1011111 
 1111111
```
